casebody.data:
PRIME LOCATIONS OF CT, LLC, et al.
v.
ROCKY HILL DEVELOPMENT, LLC, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 1, 2016

Christopher A. Klepps, Richard D. Carella and Kevin J. McEleney, in support of the petition.

Daniel J. Krisch, in opposition.

The plaintiffs' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 786, 145 A.3d 317 (2016), is denied.
